main.name: Drexel AI
main.description: We promote machine learning techniques and help Dragons get familiar with Artificial Intelligence
main.bio: Drexel AI seeks to help Dragons get familiar with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning fields. AI is evolving quickly. People who manage to stay familiar with the cutting-edge technology of AI has simply more advantage in today's world. Drexel AI aims to promote the power of this field, and help Dragons have such advantage.
main.contactmessage: Contact us for any questions you might have
